Author: crankyhedgiebutt
Text: Wtf teacher?! That’s uncalled for. Maybe you should tell the teacher to back off or not to say any comments because it’s inappropriate for a teacher to be speaking about students’ bodies- that’ll shut them up. That comment is a double whammy and I don’t know how to even begin processing it myself.   Ugh fuck that teacher! You don’t listen to him or her. Fuck them. I’m super pissed for you

Author: spookgrl
Text: You could say you have an allergy and that you'd like to join but you'll eat beforehand?
